Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand told US television Sunday she had visited Gabrielle Giffords the previous day and found her`` doing great'' and`` making progress every day.'' Gabrielle Giffords is using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand told NBC's`` Meet The Press'' program.`` It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury,'' she added. Eric Schmidt Steps Down; Co-founder Page is New Google CEO Mark Hefflinger on January 20, 2011- 10:35 am. Mountain View, Calif.- Citing a desire to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility at the top of the company, Google on Thursday announced that CEO Eric Schmidt will step down, becoming executive chairman, while co-founder Larry Page will take over as chief executive.
